title: How to Get the Assembly Skull in Halo 3

steps.headline: Begin a Forge session on the Assembly map.
steps.description: This can be done by selecting the Forge from the main menu and selecting the Assembly map from the ones available. Gathering the Mythic skulls is infinitely easier when you are in a Forge session rather than Custom game.

steps.headline: Enter editor mode (or oracle form) by pressing UP on the D-Pad once you have begun play.
steps.description: Make sure that if you are not host, that the player who is has enabled all players to be able to enter editor mode.

steps.headline: Locate the centre tower/structure in the middle of the map.
steps.description: It contains an active camouflage and gravity hammer in its interior. From this building will be two large extensions of wire tubing supports coming from halfway up either side of the outer wall and running to the bases at the sides of the map.

steps.headline: Fly as high as you can up along the outside wall of the centre structure while in editor mode until you cannot move any higher.
Move to where the wire tubing on the dark side of the map meets this centre structure (on the western side).
steps.description: If you pass over the girders protruding from the structure either side of the wire tubing, then you will see the Assembly Skull resting on the blue wire tubing near where it connects to the centre structure.

steps.headline: Change from editor mode back into player form by pressing UP on the D-Pad again and stand on the wire tubing where the skull is resting.
steps.description: Pick it up by pressing the Right Bumper when prompted and be careful not to fall off before you claim it. Congratulations, you just found the Assembly Skull!

steps.headline: Check your Xbox 360 gamerscore and achievement statistics and you will see that the Assembly Skull achievement has been unlocked for 25 gamerscore.
steps.description: It is represented by a skull with worm-like creatures on its forehead, relating to the Covenant worms which control troops such as Hunters and Scarabs on which the map is based.

text: Begin a Forge session on the Assembly map. This can be done by selecting the Forge from the main menu and selecting the Assembly map from the ones available. Gathering the Mythic skulls is infinitely easier when you are in a Forge session rather than Custom game. Enter editor mode (or oracle form) by pressing UP on the D-Pad once you have begun play. Make sure that if you are not host, that the player who is has enabled all players to be able to enter editor mode. Locate the centre tower/structure in the middle of the map. It contains an active camouflage and gravity hammer in its interior. From this building will be two large extensions of wire tubing supports coming from halfway up either side of the outer wall and running to the bases at the sides of the map. Fly as high as you can up along the outside wall of the centre structure while in editor mode until you cannot move any higher.  Move to where the wire tubing on the dark side of the map meets this centre structure (on the western side). If you pass over the girders protruding from the structure either side of the wire tubing, then you will see the Assembly Skull resting on the blue wire tubing near where it connects to the centre structure. Change from editor mode back into player form by pressing UP on the D-Pad again and stand on the wire tubing where the skull is resting. Pick it up by pressing the Right Bumper when prompted and be careful not to fall off before you claim it. Congratulations, you just found the Assembly Skull! Check your Xbox 360 gamerscore and achievement statistics and you will see that the Assembly Skull achievement has been unlocked for 25 gamerscore. It is represented by a skull with worm-like creatures on its forehead, relating to the Covenant worms which control troops such as Hunters and Scarabs on which the map is based.
